e: ￹`O~ `pala~`foay~ `ci~`~ `satan~.￺Satan brings trouble and calamity on people.￻撒旦是邪惡的，撒旦帶來惡運給人類
￹`Ma~`'odang~ `cingra~ `saka~ `ira~ `lo~ `lafo~ `no~ `loma'~.￺He committed adultery, so the home has a stigma (or trouble) .￻他犯姦淫，因此導致家中的恥辱憂慮
d.f: ￹￺trouble * calamity * stigma as a result of breaking taboo￻憂慮，不幸，恥辱，瑕疵，冒犯禁忌而遭禍
